summary: The diff adds export scripts (sh/ps1) that generate an archive containing backend/ and frontend/ plus a limited set of root files, and adds documentation files under frontend/. However, it does not clearly satisfy the requirement for a top-level export documentation file, and the export scripts may omit additional repository/config files beyond the hardcoded list.

missing_requirements.requirement: Produce an exportable, complete copy of the full project source code (backend and frontend) as a single downloadable package, ensuring it includes all files needed to build and run the app locally (including configuration files already present in the project).
missing_requirements.reason: The export scripts only copy `backend/`, `frontend/`, and a small hardcoded list of root files (`dfx.json`, `.gitignore`, `README.md`, `LICENSE`). The requirement/AC calls for a complete repository export including all project config files that exist in the workspace, and the diff does not show inclusion of other possible root-level files/directories (e.g., package manager/workspace files, CI configs, etc.).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a top-level documentation file that explains how to obtain/export the full source code from the app/project workspace and how to run it locally, using only English user-facing text.
missing_requirements.reason: The added documentation file is located at `frontend/SOURCE_CODE_EXPORT.md`, not at the repository top level as required by the AC (“top-level documentation file”, e.g., `EXPORT.md` or `SOURCE_CODE_EXPORT.md`). The scripts also copy that file into the archive as `README_EXPORT.md`, but that is inside the generated archive—not a committed top-level doc file in the repo.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an additional documentation file describing the export artifact output (`frontend/scripts/EXPORT_ARTIFACT.md`) that is not explicitly requested (REQ-12 asks for a top-level export doc, not a scripts subfolder artifact doc).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only specifies adding a single top-level documentation file explaining export and local run instructions; it does not request a separate artifact documentation file under `frontend/scripts/`.
